title: Start
body: <>It’s open! <> <>Brynn! <> <> <> <> <><>It’s so good to finally see you! <>I was starting to think you were going to stay in London forever. <><>Honestly, I wish I could’ve. It was incredible! <><>The classes... the sightseeing... the food... <><> I did! I’m glad I got the chance to study abroad, but... <>... I also missed you all a lot. <>You guys are my best friends, you know? <><>Aww, Brynn! I missed you too! <><>Without you, everyone’s kind of been doing their own thing... <><> ... but now that our DM’s here, at least we can get back to D&D! <><>Yeah! I can’t wait to see how the campaign wraps up after all these years. <>I’m so excited to see you guys finally battle Lady Malacatha! <><>I know, I can’t believe we finally cornered her! <> And all it took to get here was a teensy alliance between nations. <><>You’ll be needing that alliance! She’s pretty powerful normally, but who knows what she’ll do now that you’ve backed her into a corner? <>Hey, we’re the heroes of the Fullcrest Alliance! We can take anything she can throw at us. <><>Of course! <><>So I guess this’ll be the last session. I’m kind of sad to see it end, but at the same time I can’t wait to bring you guys to a new campaign. <>I feel the same way. We’ve been playing these characters together for so long. I’m really gonna miss them. <>But then we get to create new characters, and that’s always a fun time. <><>Yeah, for sure! [[How are things with you?|HowAreThings]] [[Have any new character ideas?|HaveAnyNew]]

title: RubyOkayOkay
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Ruby interruptionOne>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX rubyLaugh>>Alright, alright! Sounds like you had an awesome time, huh.

title: HowAreThings
body: <>So, how have things been? <>Everything’s been okay. Sort of... <>Only sort of? Why? <><>Uh, ‘cause... <>... ‘cause I’m taking Organic Chemistry this semester! Yeah, that class is killing me. <>Oh, I don’t want to know, do I? <>Nope. <>I tried finding a study group but... talking to people is hard. <>I’m sure everyone in your class feels that way, too. <>Yeah, maybe. <>It was just nice back in high school when we could always go to each other for help. <>Franklin helped me get through history, and I’m pretty sure you saved my AP English grade! <><>You know we’ve got your back! <><>But, if you’re having trouble, you’ve gotta make sure to ask for help, okay? <>Promise you’ll look into getting some tutoring? <>Yeah, of course. [[Rebranch1]]

title: HaveAnyNew
body: <>So, have any ideas about who your next character will be? <><>Hmmm... <>I don’t know, Vel is the best character I’ve ever made so topping her is going to be pretty hard. <>Oh, oh! What if I played her twin? <>Vel has a twin? <>Well she doesn’t right now, but she could! <>Oooh! Twins who were separated at birth! <>Maybe the other one grew up somewhere else with a different family, but like Vel she discovered she had an affinity for magic, or something. <>Fair enough, but are you sure you’re not interested in trying a different kind of character? <>Well I don’t know, I just love the way it feels to play her. <>She’s kind and caring, yet powerful. So powerful that she can keep all the people she cares about standing strong. People rely on her and look up to her. <>She is pretty incredible. Alright, you could play her twin if you wanted to. <>Thanks Brynn! I know it’s not the most original idea, though. I’ll probably check out the handbook one more time and see if I get any other bright ideas. [[Rebranch1]]

title: Rebranch1
body: <> <>It’s me! <>Door’s open! <> <>Woah, Franklin’s here already? <> <> <><> Hey, guys! <>Wow, look who’s on time for once! <>I’m so proud of you! Is this gonna be a regular thing? <>I wouldn’t bet on it, you know how much my manager loves keeping me past clock out. <>So why didn’t he this time? <>Well, I might’ve told him about this awesome friend of mine who had just come back to the states. He let me leave a little early to meet with them. <><>Very nice! Maybe after working there for years, you’ve finally wormed your way into his little old heart. <>So, when do I get to meet this really cool friend of yours? <><><>Oh, shut up. <>It’s good to have you back, Brynn. <>It’s good to be back! <>*Ahem!* <>It’s great to see you too, Ruby, as always. <><>And about not being able to meet up, I’m sorry. Scheduling these past few months has been... well— [[Been working a lot these days?|BeenWorkingALot]] [[Ready to jump back in?|ReadyToJump]]

title: RubyItsOkayReally
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Ruby interruptionOne>><<overridePose Ruby happy>>It’s okay! Really, don’t worry about it.

title: ReadyToJump
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Need any help getting back up to speed?
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinThinking>>I think I’ve got it. I had a few minutes to look over my character sheet yesterday.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Barbarians can’t rage when wearing heavy armor, right?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Correct.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<overridePose Franklin happy>>Cool, got it. Been looking forward to being the big damage-dealer again.
[[Rebranch2]]

title: BeenWorkingALot
body: <>Is your schedule still the same? <><>Yep, unfortunately. <>I mean, school and work are fine on their own, but, like, the both of them together? <>You know what I mean. <>I get it. Just don’t push yourself too hard. <>Yeah, take breaks so we can actually see you! <><>That’s why I’m here. To sit back, relax, and roll crits on some monsters. [[Rebranch2]]

title: Rebranch2
body: <>So what about you, Brynn? How are you? <>Oh, I’m good! Even better now that I’m back here with you guys. <>Let me tell you, going cold turkey on RPG’s after playing once a week for two years? <>Not fun. <>No kidding! How do you think we felt? <>Yeah, and at the very least you know what’s coming next. Us? You left us right as we got to Lady Malacatha’s castle last session! Lady Malacatha. <>Seriously! Do you know how horrible this wait has been, Brynn?! <>There are laws against torturing people like that! You should’ve been charged with war crimes! <><><>War crimes... <><>I’m sorry, I’m sorry! I had to catch my flight! <>Uh huh, likely story. But no excuses this time! Today’s the day we finally end Malacatha’s tyrannical reign, right, Franklin? <>Damn right! Assuming everything goes smoothly, anyway. <><><>And, uh, speaking of things going smoothly, are those two still...? <><><><>Oh... um... yeah. At least... if anything’s changed, I haven’t heard. <><>Heard about what, exactly? <>The Allison and Lance mess. <>The... what? <>Frank, she just got back. <>Oh, duh, of course. You wouldn’t know. <>Well, where do I begin... <>Do you remember that musical they were trying to produce together? <>Yeah, are they still looking for playhouses where they can to show it? <>Wait a sec. I mean, maybe we don’t have to get into this right now. What if they show up and they’re fine? It has been a while since they— [[LanceAllisonArrival]]

title: LanceAllisonArrival
body: <> <><>What part of “we’re not talking about this today” didn’t you get? Can you just shut up? <><><> I would if you’d listen to me for five seconds; I’m just trying to get you to understand me here. Can you at least—? <><>Nevermind... <>That’s...? <><>*sigh* Allison and Lance? Yup. <>Sorry Brynn, I should’ve warned you about this but I... didn’t really know how to bring it up. <>Jesus, Allison, why are you still so hung up over this? I’ve already told you— <><>Me?! I’m not hung up over anything! You’re the one who keeps bringing it— <>Well, maybe you should’ve thought about that before you made me look like a complete dumbass! <>So, this has been a thing? <>For the past few months, yeah. <>Every time I’ve gotten them together it ends up with them arguing over that show... <>It just never ends. <>WHAT? What fantasy world are you living in where you think I’m the selfish one here? <>REALITY! <> <> <><> HEY. GUYS. THE DOOR’S OPEN. <> <><>... <> <> <> <>... <> <> <>So... how much of that did you guys hear? <>Enough. <><>...Sorry about that. <><>Yeah, sorry... <><><>It’s really good to see you, Brynn. How’s my girl been? <><>I’m good, but... um— <><>Don’t be afraid to message us every now and then, okay? We want to see how you’re doing! <>Sorry, I was just so busy I’d forget sometimes. <>Aah, it’s okay. No use sweating about it now that you’re back with us! <><>It’s absolutely astounding to see you again, Brynn! <> <><>And Ruby and Franklin as well! It’s been some time since we’ve all hung out, huh? <>Uh, yeah! <>I hope things have been going well! Err, I mean, I hope that things have been... uh... <>Things’ve been fine. Actually, they’ve been pretty great. [[Getting any work?|GettingAnyWork]] [[Ready to jump back into D&D?|ReadyToJumpTwo]]

title: AllisonSureFine
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Allison interruptionOne>>SURE. FINE. There, are you happy now? Can we finally stop talking about it?

title: LanceAwkwardSilenceOne
body:
<<activateOffScreenSimultaneousSpeechBubble Lance speakerTwo>>...
<<activateSimultaneousSpeechBubble Lance speakerTwo>>...

title: LanceCauseYouWont
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Lance interruptionOne>>Cause you won’t fucking talk to me without being a passive-aggressive nightmare!

title: AllisonBoyAmI
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Allison interruptionOne>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX allisonPositive>>Boy am I glad to hear that! You had us pretty worried at times honestly.

title: GettingAnyWork
body: <>So, have you two been finding work? <><>Ooh, yeah, I never told you guys! I’ve been landing guitar gigs! <><>Oh, really?! That’s great to hear! <><> Yeah, I’m totally stoked! I’m finally making money after all that effort. <>And Lance, I heard that you’re in a show in the playhouse downtown. <><>That I am! It's a production of Fiddler on the Roof. <><>I mean it’s not on Broadway or anything, but y’know, still pretty cool. <>That’s great! i'm so happy for both of you. <>For sure! But, uh... if you don’t mind my asking, what about your musical? Is that going okay? [[Rebranch3]]

title: ReadyToJumpTwo
body: <>So, you both ready for the big finale? <><>Oh, yeah! <><>Definitely. <>It’s been far too long since I was... <><><>Arannis Shadowfall. Dashing gentleman, masterful rogue, and sworn enemy of injustice. <> <><>Yep, classic. <><>Good to see you as always, Arannis. <><>Good to be seen! <> <>Allison, think you’re ready for all the encounters in the castle? <><>I mean, as ready as I can be! <><>But yeah, we can beat anything you throw at us, as long as we don’t do anything dumb. <> <><>What’s that supposed to mean? <>Uh, it didn’t mean anything. Just don’t be chaotic-stupid, or whatever. <>I know when you’re trying to call me out, Allison. <><><>Jesus, are you that insecure—? [[Rebranch3]]

title: Rebranch3
body: <> <> <>Um, well... <>Right, so, here’s the deal. The show’s kind of... <>We sort of decided that we were going to... <>Put it on hiatus. <>...Yeah, exactly. <>Oh. I’m sorry to hear that. I know it meant a lot to you, Allison. <>It’s fine. I’m over it. Besides, we just couldn’t seem to work well together. <>Yeah, you know how it is. Some people just get so invested in a project that if any little thing goes wrong, it’s suddenly the end of the world. <><>I mean, when someone else misses a ton of rehearsals and an absolutely critical meeting with playhouse owners— <>Okay! I’m sorry, we don’t have to keep talking about it. I didn’t mean to make things awkward. <>No it’s... it’s okay. We’re fine. <>How about we just try playing some D&D? We won’t have to worry about anything else that’s going on, just relax and have fun for a bit. <><>We’ve come a long way. It would be shame to just let Lady Malacatha’s plans come to fruition, wouldn’t it? <>Yeah, you’re right. <>True enough. <><><><>Fear not, everyone. Arannis Shadowfall is at your side! <> <>Okay, everyone ready? <><><>Yeah, let’s do it! <><><>Yes! <><><>You bet. <><><><>Onward to victory! <> [[IntroSpeech]]

title: BrynnOkayOkay
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Brynn interruptionOne>>Okay, okay! What’s wrong, you two? What happened with the musical?

title: LanceHeyIWasHonest
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Lance interruptionOne>><<overridePose Lance irritated>>Hey! I was honest about my other commitments. I can’t put my life on pause just for one little—

title: IntroSpeech
body:
<<fadeOutSound CuedMusicStings>>
<<overridePose Brynn neutral>>
<<overridePose Allison neutral>>
<<overridePose Franklin neutral>>
<<overridePose Lance neutral>>
<<overridePose Ruby neutral>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Alright, then.
<<triggerSound CuedMusicStings musicTrackTwo>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>When last we saw our heroes, the great adventurers of lore, they were continuing their quest to defeat Lady Malacatha and end her reign of tyranny.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>The heroes had been fighting her for a long time. They’d met many friends along the way, some of them brave warriors, some of them ordinary townsfolk...
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<overridePose Lance happy>>Like Garth, the tavern owner.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<overridePose Franklin happy>>Oh my God, do you think he’s still angry at us?
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Hey, it’s not our fault he didn’t have fire insurance for his tavern.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>I’m still really sorry about that!
<<overridePose Franklin neutral>>
<<overridePose Lance neutral>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>And now, inspired by the heroes, these friends and comrades have begun an assault on Lady Malacatha’s castle.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Here’s hoping they can all make it through this.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>If all goes well, the group will finally complete the mission they’ve had for so long.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>So, we’d snuck up next to the castle, right? What’s the area look like again, Brynn?
[[Rocky and covered in sand.|RockySandy]]
[[Cracked by lava fissures.|Lava]]
[[Covered in snow.|Snow]]

title: RockySandy
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>There are huge points of obsidian rock coming out of the pale desert ground surrounding the glooming, gothic castle. 
It should give you adequate cover with which to approach.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Solid, good to know.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>The dune on which you’re standing gives you a good view of the battle below. 
The Fullcrest Alliance is fighting Malacatha’s forces in a vast desert plain about a mile away.
[[Rebranch4]]

title: Lava
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Her castle is surrounded by lava flows from the foot of the nearby volcano...
... the glow from which highlights the castle’s glooming, gothic silhouette.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<overridePose Allison happy>>Oooh, super-ominous. Love it.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>The rocky hill on which you’re standing gives you a good view of the battle below. 
The Fullcrest Alliance is fighting Malacatha’s forces in a vast rocky plain about a mile away.
[[Rebranch4]]

title: Snow
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Underneath a stormy sky, the entire landscape is covered in snow and ice. A billowing storm is sending more snow down upon you.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<overridePose Lance happy>>I have to say, Brynn. As far as locations for final showdowns go, this is pretty unique.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<overridePose Brynn happy>>Thanks!
<<overridePose Brynn neutral>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>There’s snow in the air, but you can still see the battle in the clearing below.
The Fullcrest Alliance is fighting Malacatha’s forces in a tundra expanse about a mile away.
[[Rebranch4]]

title: Rebranch4
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>As far as you can tell, Malacatha’s forces haven’t noticed that you’ve split away from the Alliance.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<changeFont Lance inCharacter>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX lanceArannis>>Brilliant. We have the element of surprise.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX allisonTiana>>Yes, it seems the plan’s worked perfectly. Perhaps you should have had more faith in me, Arannis.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yes, yes, Tiana, you and your plans.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Whine if you like. Gundren, are you ready for battle?
<<changeFont Allison outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Jumping in just like that, huh? Alright, let me see if I can find the voice...
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<changeFont Franklin inCharacter>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinGundren>>I’m good, but the sooner we reach Malacatha and slay her, the better. Let’s move.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>I couldn’t agree more! Have your Teleportation spell handy, Vel?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX rubyVel>>Why of course, Arannis! 
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Where should I teleport us again? The throne room?
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Precisely! Preferably right on top of Malacatha’s miserable face, if you would.
<<changeFont Ruby outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Alright, I cast Teleport!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Okay, okay, so as you begin casting Teleport, I’m going to need you to make a Wisdom check.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>A Wisdom check? That’s... new. Okay um...
<<rollD20 Ruby>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>18.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>18? Sorry, but you feel the influence of something emanating from the castle. Some dark and twisted presence clouds your mind.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Uh-oh... What happens?
[[Your spell is blocked.|SpellIsBlocked]]
[[You take damage.|YouTakeDamage]]

title: SpellIsBlocked
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>You recover, and realize that your spell isn’t working.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Clearly, Lady Malacatha didn’t want anyone to be able to reach her so easily.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<changeFont Ruby inCharacter>>Everyone, something’s not right. My spell won’t work.
[[MajorChoice1]]

title: YouTakeDamage
body: <>From the shock of the sudden pain, you drop the spell aaand... <> <>... take 36 points of psychic damage! You stumble to the ground, your head pounding from whatever just happened. <>36? Oh my God! <><>Vel? Vel, what’s wrong? <>Ow... it’s nothing. I’m okay. <>Something stopped me from teleporting us in. This must be Malacatha’s doing. <><>You look a little sickly. Come here for a moment. <><>And I’ll feel her forehead and cast Healing Word to undo some of that damage... <> <><>Take back 14 health. <><>Oh, thank you Tiana. I feel much better. <> [[MajorChoice1]]

title: MajorChoice1
body: <> <>Vel, you can discern that this anti-magic field seems to emanate from the castle itself. You doubt you’ll be able to teleport within its walls. <>Oh, yikes. I do so, then report all of this to the party. <><>Well, that complicates things. Vel, do you think you could try again? <> <>I don’t know, I don’t think so. I’d probably need to roll at least a 19 to— <><><>Err... I mean, her anti-magic is probably too strong for my spells to overcome! <>Damn. So we can’t teleport in, and we probably can’t smash our way in, either. <> <> Hardly a problem when Arannis Shadowfall is at your side! Stand back, everyone. <> <><><>Oh, God... <><>Alright, so I stretch my arms and jog in place for a moment, then beeline towards the castle wall— <><>Wh—? *Sigh* <> <><><><>Arannis, what are you doing? <>Why, no less than saving the mission, Tiana. You know how agile I am. I can vault up the side of the wall and then tie a rope for you all to climb up. <>It’s the enemy’s fortress! There could be undead guards up there; they’d attack you immediately. <><>They’d try. <> <>And then Arannis winks, and cracks his knuckles. <><>No, they’d succeed. And even if they didn’t, it could still completely ruin our chances of getting in undetected. Don’t be suicidal, Arannis. <><><>Look here Tiana, I realize that ever since you got us out of that snake pit you’ve fancied yourself as some great tactician... <> ...but right now my skills are all you need. Aren’t I right, everyone? <>Oh, your “skills”? The ones that got us trapped in that snake pit in the first place? I don’t think so. We have to work as a team. <>Well, what do you propose, then, oh wise-and-noble leader? <><><>Uh... Arannis? Tiana? I’m sure we’ll all be happy to get inside regardless of what approach we take. <>Agreed. Are we going to sit here and squabble or are we going to get in that castle? <>We will, once Arannis agrees that we find a more intelligent way to proceed. <>This is a fortified castle! What other way could there possibly be to get in? <> [[(Add more details to the castle)|AddDetails]] [[(Nudge them forward)|NudgeThemForward]]

title: AllisonYeeeahNo
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Allison interruptionOne>>Wait, no. Brynn, I block his path.

title: AddDetails
body: <> <> <> <>I should point out that there are a few noteworthy elements of the castle, if they’re relevant to whatever you decide. There a few high windows here and there along its outer wall, most of which are covered by metal bars. <>Also, every now and again you can see a skeleton archer or two walk across the top of the wall. <>Finally, you notice a vast column of undead warriors pouring out from the main gates on the other side of the castle towards the nearby battle. <><><>Even with those skeleton archers, I could easily— <><>Alright, Arannis, you want a better idea? How about this, everyone. <>I’ll use Seeming to disguise us all as undead, and we’ll all sneak in through the front gate. <>There’s a smaller chance of us being spotted, and we don’t have to depend the entirety of the mission on our Rogue’s luck. <>What? That’s such a roundabout approach! My way is simpler. <> <>Actually... I like Tiana’s plan. With so many undead marching out the front, they wouldn’t notice a few extra of their number going back inside. <><>Exactly! <>Hm, that sounds fine to me. <>Then we’re agreed! Sorry, you’re outvoted, Arannis. <><>But my way always works! You’ve never had a problem with it before! <>The stakes are too high this time. We absolutely cannot be detected before reaching Malacatha. <>Sorry, Arannis, but you can show off some other time, okay? <> <>...Sure. Whatever. I go along with it. <> <>I discreetly make my way around to the front of the castle. Everyone coming? <>Yep! <>Sure. <>...Yeah. <>Alright. You make your way around to the front of the castle. Malacatha’s army is there, as you saw previously. There are skeletons emerging from the castle, in a long, clattering column, alongside various undead. <>Alright, folks, I cast Seeming on everyone, making us all look like some really battle worn skeletons. Broken ribs, cracked skulls, the works. <>Sounds good. There’s space for you to enter on either side of the column, and the undead aren’t intelligent enough to perceive you entering. Eventually all the real undead exit and you’re safely alone, for the time being. <><><>Not bad. <><><>Yeah, that worked like a charm! <><><>Nothing to it. Then I snap my fingers and drop Seeming. <>My way would’ve been much simpler, but I suppose we should be glad that worked. <><>You can pout all you like Arranis, but please try and save it for after we’ve accomplished our goal. [[MajorChoice2]]

title: NudgeThemForward
body: <> <> <> <>Try not to take too long to decide. This is only the first encounter, you know. <>Yeah, seriously... <><>Enough of this! I’m going up the wall. <><><>Arannis, do not. <><><>If Arannis can do it, he should. We can’t kill Malacatha until we get inside. <><><>Gundren, you know him. If we let him start his theatrics now— <><>Can you two just...? Nevermind. <><><>If it gets us in faster, I support Arannis’ plan. <><>I do, too...I guess. <> <>I mean, we should get going... <>Fine... <>So you step out of the way? <>Sure. <> <>Great. I run at the wall and parkour up the side. <>Okay, give me an acrobatics check. <> <>Plus all bonuses, that’s a 25. <>Alright, you for sure make it up that wall. Do you want to add any flourishes? <><>You know me so well. <>I grab outcroppings and protruding bricks and things, and do little flips to leap between them. <>When I get to the top, I cartwheel up the ledge, take out two knives and throw them into one guard each. <>I never said there were guards. <>You never needed to. <>Well, as it happens, there is a pair skeletons up there. Given your dexterity, I’ll let you have the first attack. <>Nice. <> <><>Aaand, that’s a crit! <>Oof! Honestly, for these guards we can skip the damage roll and assume you take them out, given that it was a surprise attack. <><>What’s wrong, my sorry, undead friends? Is Arannis’ speed too much for you? <><>They’re dead, Arannis. Your boasting only reaches our ears, and we’ve no need for it. <> <><>Okay, chill. <><>Anyway, I tie a rope onto one of the crenellations and let it down for everyone to climb up on. <><>Were my skills to your satisfaction, Tiana? <> <>Just get inside. <>Once you’ve all climbed up, you find a trapdoor into the castle on the wall. [[MajorChoice2]]

title: AllisonOhShitWait
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Allison interruptionOne>><<changeFont Allison outOfCharacter>><<overridePose Allison neutral>>Oh, shit. Wait a sec...

title: LanceOhYouKnow
body: <><>Oh, you know me. I see, I see...

title: MajorChoice2
body:
<<triggerSound CuedMusicStings musicTrackTwo>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Now that you’re inside, you’re able to get a good look at the castle.
[[(Dark and mystical)|DarkMystical]]
[[(Austere and militaristic)|AustereMilitaristic]]
[[(Rich and decadent)|RichDecadent]]

title: AustereMilitaristic
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Everything is made of gray, hard stone. 
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Pale light flits in through long glass-less windows that stretch all the way to the incredibly high ceiling.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>There are dark, twisted looking swords and other weapons in wall racks. Many still have entrails hanging from them.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<changeFont Allison inCharacter>>Disgusting. She doesn’t even bother to clean them up.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<changeFont Lance inCharacter>>It’s time someone put her down.
[[Rebranch5]]

title: DarkMystical
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>It’s like the entire inside of the building is made of dark, misty glass.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Sloping downward from the ceiling are large crystals casting an unearthly purple glow everywhere.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>You see green glass vats lining the walls. On closer inspection, you see half-disintegrated bodies inside.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<changeFont Ruby inCharacter>>No! It’s just like the vats we found in Lady Malacatha’s remote outposts. We can’t let this fate befall the rest of the Fullcrest Alliance!
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<changeFont Lance inCharacter>>We’re going to find her and end this.
[[Rebranch5]]

title: RichDecadent
body: <>It’s like a mansion. Thick velvet rugs cover the floors. Massive oak tables and bookshelves line the walls. <>Candles hanging from the ceilings cast a glow over paintings of Lady Malacatha, as well as the trophies she’s collected from around the world. <>You see suits of armor bearing the sigil of the Fullcrest Alliance. Some of them still have the bloodstains on them. <><>So, she’s evil and rich, then. <><>Her reign ends today. [[Rebranch5]]

title: Rebranch5
body: <> <>You find a staircase that leads up into the higher parts of the castle. <>Okay, it seems a little too quiet, but I guess we’ll just have to be careful. I go up the stairs. <>I follow. <>Me too. <>Same. <>The staircase ends at a strange room, about midway up the castle. It’s wide, tall and curiously empty. <>Uh-oh... <>Then, you hear a man let out a familiar maniacal cackle... <><><><>He-he-hee! A pleasure to see you again, “heroes!” <><>Lady Malacatha is in the middle of important business at the moment, but I’m more than happy to keep you... entertained. <> <><>Holy shit, it’s Narravar! <>Sure is! <>A man wearing black robes embedded with glowing runes steps out of the exit on the other side of the room. He removes his hood and looks right at you, Lance. <><>Ah, Shadowfall! I didn’t expect to see you again so soon after our last encounter! Are you prepared to lose another of your loved ones? <> <><><>Yes! I had a feeling he would come back at some point! <><><>So we meet again, Bone Weaver! In memory of my father, I swear I’ll put you down! <><>Since when do you work for Lady Malacatha? When last we met, you were only interested in increasing your own power. What do you gain from this? [[Lady Malacatha's magical secrets!|MagicalSecrets]] [[Revenge on Arannis and his father!|Revenge]]

title: MagicalSecrets
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>>Ah, but it should be obvious to you, little Warlock! Lady Malacatha is the most powerful practitioner of dark magic in existence.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX brynnEvilLaugh>>The secrets she’s taught me have doubled my power. And if she wants me to kill a few arrogant heroes in return, I’m all too happy to oblige!
[[Rebranch6]]

title: Revenge
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>>Arannis’ father was my greatest enemy. I may have slain him years ago, but only by killing his offspring will my revenge be complete.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<changeFont Lance inCharacter>>I’ve bested you before and I’ll best you again, you scum!
<<changeFont Brynn outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>His face twists into a smile and shakes his head.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>><<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX brynnEvilLaugh>>Not this time, I think.
[[Rebranch6]]

title: Rebranch6
body: <> <>Wait a sec, I roll perception on the room. <><>Go for it. <> <>21. <>Being Tiana, you get the feeling something’s definitely off. This room isn’t built like the other ones. Every surface of it is covered in metal. <>And up above, you notice what look like swirling thunderclouds inside the room, just beneath the ceiling. <>Oh, Jesus. What? <>At that moment Narravar touches his hand to the crystal amulet around his neck, and each exit is sealed by a column of some kind of transparent crystal. <>A column of crystal also erupts from the ground below him, raising him above the metal floor. <><>Everyone, the room is set up to conduct lightning from that magical storm up above. He’s probably going to finish summoning it, then... <> <><>Wait, hang on! <>I cast Telepathic Bond on all four of us so that Narravar won’t hear this dope plan. <>Sounds good. What do you say, or think, to everyone? <><>Alright, so the spell Narravar used to conjure that storm probably doesn’t target its caster... <><>... but we can use something metal to conduct the electricity and force it back towards him. Essentially, we trap him in his own trap. <><>Ah! Okay. <><>Interesting. <><>Yeah! We’ll just need to stall, so I can find something in here that we can use to entrap him. <><><>Keep him talking, and I’ll look around for— <> <><><>Oh, God... <><><>Just you and I, Narravar. This is between us. <> <>Okay, I telepathically accost Arranis. <> <><>Arannis, stop! If you engage him, we’ll lose the element of surprise. <><>Suits me fine. I promised my father that I would use his sword to slay Narravar, and that’s one promise Arannis Shadowfall intends to keep. <><>Oh, it suits you? What about everyone else, who can’t afford to lose health before facing Malacatha? <><>I've been tracking Narravar down since before this party came together, and you want me to put that on hold... ... so you can what, scrounge around for scrap metal? [[(Have Narravar accept the duel)|NarravarDuel]] [[(Put metal chains in the room)|Chains]]

title: LanceNarravar
body: <<fadeOutSound CuedMusicStings>><<overridePose Lance irritated>><<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Lance interruptionOne>><<changeFont Lance inCharacter>>Narravar, I challenge you to a duel!

title: NarravarDuel
body: <> <> <> <>Narravar makes his crystal platform descend back into the ground. He steps in front of you, Arranis. <><>Very well, Shadowfall. Let’s bring an end to this dance of ours! But first, just so your comrades don’t intervene... <> <> <>He touches his amulet again, and more crystals rise out of the ground in a dome shape around you and him. It covers the floor beneath you, as well, isolating both you and him from your allies and the effects of any electrical current. <><><>Alright, let’s do this! <>Everyone else, you see the magical storm above start to glow and crackle. <> <><>You can’t defeat me, Shadowfall, and you certainly can’t defeat me before my storm wipes out your friends! <> <><>Goddammit, Lance... <>Alright, I brandish Starcleaver. <>Narravar scowls upon seeing an enchanted blade. <><>You think some glowing sword will be enough to do me in? <><><>It was enough for my father when he used it to defeat you all those years ago, and it will be enough for me to finish you off now! <> <> <>Alright, roll initiative! <> <> <> <> <> <>Okay, the storm goes first. A bolt of lightning strikes the metal floor and does 20 points of damage to everyone outside the crystal dome. That goes double if you’re wearing metal armor. <>Oof, okay. <>Allison, you’re up. What do you do? <>I call out to Franklin and Ruby. <><><>Vel, Gundren! Attack the dome. We need to kill Narravar to end the storm spell, now! <> <>Do you each do so? <>Yes! I hurl Eldritch Blasts at it. <>And I hit it with my axe. <>The crystal dome looks damaged, but it will take a lot more than that to bring it down. <><>Relax, I have this under control! <> <><>I grin at Narravar, so that he sees how confident I am... <> <>...then slash him with Starcleaver. <>Looks good. Narravar screams out in pain as the blade strikes home. Because he’s a dark magic user, he takes a ton of extra damage. In fact, he’s already bloodied. <>On his turn, Narravar follows up with a powerful Eldritch Blast. <>I use Uncanny Dodge. <>Nice! In that case, you only take 10 damage. Speaking of which, the rest of you take another 20 or 40 as another lightning strike hits the floor outside the dome. <>I try to attack the dome again, I suppose. <>You do so. It’s a little more damaged than it was before, but not by much. <><><>Why bother, Vel? Arannis has this under control. <> <>I take another slash at Narravar! <> <>Oooh, with that he’s down! How do you want to do this? <>I twirl the sword around in my hand... <><>This one’s for you, father. <> <>... and then I stab him in the chest. <> <>Alright, Narravar is dead. The storm ends, and the columns of crystal blocking the exits disintegrate, meaning you’re all free to go. The crystal dome disintegrates as well. <> <> <><>I grab Arannis by the collar. <> <><>Don’t you ever do that again. <> <><>Okay, I squirm out of your grip. <><>I’m not apologizing for killing that monster. <><>Then apologize for almost killing us! <><><>Okay then. Excuse me for slaying the one person I’ve spent years of my life hunting. Sorry, my mistake— [[Rebranch7]]

title: Chains
body: <> <> <>Well, Lance, Narravar looks at you and says... <><>Pfff! Why should I go to all the trouble of killing you myself, when my storm will do it for me? <> <> <>He gestures his hand upward towards the storm. As if to answer, the storm lets out a massive thunderclap that reverberates throughout the room... <><>...causing the suspended chandelier in the room to shake as well, making a jingling sound. <>Wait, what’s holding up the chandelier? <>It looks like silver chains. <><>Oh, man, perfect! <> <><>Okay, okay, I telepathically reach out to Franklin and Ruby. <><>Gundren, can you hurl a weapon at one of those chandelier chains? <><>I think so. <><>Vel, once he does that, could you use your Telekinesis spell to wrap one end of that chain around Narravar? <><>I can certainly try. <> <>Franklin, I’ll give you Bardic Inspiration to use if you need to. <><>Alright, Gundren. Fire at will. <> <>Okay, I hurl one of my handaxes past the storm and at one of the chandelier chains. <><>Okay, give me an attack roll. <> <>18. <>That does it, but Narravar saw that happen. He says a few arcane words, and the storm starts to crackle with lightning. <>I cast Telekinesis, and use it to grab the free end of the chain and wrap it around Narravar’s ankle. <>You have advantage, given that he still doesn’t suspect what you’re up to, but I’ll still need you to roll for it to see if you succeed. <> <>Uh, 7, and... <> <><><>...17! <>Okay, Narravar has chains around his ankle and... <>...He’s getting electrocuted by his own storm! <>Okay, while he’s stunned, I draw my sword and run him through. <><><>Arannis, wait! Your sword is made of metal, you’ll be electrocuted too! <><>I swore at my father’s grave that I would use his blade to slay Narravar! <><>It’s too dangerous! Arannis, please! <> <><>I... I stand down, I guess. <>Okay, Narravar is so overwhelmed by the electrical shock that he can’t react or get free. It’s only a matter of time before he collapses. <> <> <> <>The storm ends, and the columns of crystal blocking the exits disintegrate, meaning you’re all free to go. <><><><>Excellent work, everyone! That all went off without a hitch. <> <>I run over to Narravar. Is he dead? <>Well, yes. You can’t feel a heartbeat, so you can only assume that he’s deceased. <><>And we did it all without taking so much as an ounce of damage. <><><>Are you kidding me? Now I’ll never have the chance to fulfill the vow to my father! <> <><><><>Your father’s dead. And you know what? We’re not! That’s a win in my bo— [[Rebranch7]]

title: AllisonDoYouEvenCare
body: <><>Do you even care about what happens to your team, Arannis? Or is it always about getting what you want?

title: LanceNotForMe
body: <><><>Not for me!

title: Rebranch7
body: <> <> <> <> <><><>Listen, I’ve sacrificed a lot for this party... <><><>...I’ve carried this party on my back, even, and I... <><><><>Uh... *Ahem!* Arannis? Tiana? Perhaps it’s best if we, um... <><><>...it is about the team! It’s always about the team to me! If you ever... <> <> <> <> <> <> <><>OKAY! <><>... <><>... <>I throw one of my handaxes at Arannis and Tiana, but make sure to just miss them. <>Jesus, Franklin... <><>Malacatha’s forces are outside right now killing our friends. You two have to drop this, or the alliance we spent years putting together falls apart. <><>So, let’s get going already. <><>Um... Gundren is right. We need to hold together. <> <>I go towards the exit. Is anyone following me? <>Uh, yeah, yeah. Sure. <>Okay, alright. Fine. [[Should we take a break?|TakeABreak]] [[Alright, on we go.|OnWeGo]]

title: AllisonYouWereLikeThis
body: <<activateSimultaneousSpeechBubble Allison speakerTwo>><<changeFontSimultaneousDialogue Allison inCharacter>>You were like this when we fought Narravar before, when we were saving that town from bandits...

title: AllisonLikeThisWhen
body: <<activateSimultaneousSpeechBubble Allison speakerTwo>><<changeFontSimultaneousDialogue Allison inCharacter>>...like this when you found your father’s sword, I mean is it ever about the party to you...?

title: AllisonOhCarryUs
body: <><>...oh, carry us on your back? Well alright then, if that’s what you call...

title: RubyAwkwardPauseFranklinInterruption
body: <<activateSimultaneousSpeechBubble Ruby speakerTwo>>...

title: AllisonAwkwardPauseFranklinInterruption
body: <<activateSimultaneousSpeechBubble Allison speakerTwo>><<changeFontSimultaneousDialogue Allison outOfCharacter>>...

title: LanceAwkwardSilenceTwo
body: <<activateSimultaneousSpeechBubble Lance speakerTwo>>...

title: TakeABreak
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Maybe we should break before we continue on, just for everyone to relax for a second.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>That might be a good idea, yeah. Guys?
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>No, no. I’m good. Let’s finish this.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yeah, let’s keep going. I’m ready to see how the campaign ends.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Okay then... if that’s what everyone’s okay with.
[[Rebranch8]]

title: OnWeGo
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Alright. You’re getting pretty close to the end here. Let’s keep it rolling.
[[Rebranch8]]

title: Rebranch8
body: <> <>Moving forward, you find a spiral staircase, and start to make your way up the castle’s main tower. <>There are windows on the staircase, through which you can see the battle still raging far below. The Fullcrest Alliance isn’t in great shape. They’ve sustained heavy losses, but are still fighting. <>Still, you know you must be close to Lady Malacatha’s throne room. Despite everything that’s going on, the odds are still good that you can pull this off. <>You eventually make it to the top of the staircase. There’s one main corridor leading forward, but you also notice a side passage. It’s dark, but there seems to be something glowing at the end of it. There’s a sliver of orange light. <><>Hm, that’s unusual. It’s probably worth checking out. <>Agreed. Let’s have a look. <>Exactly what I was going to say. <>Okay, you go down that side hallway. It’s pitch black, and the air gets hotter and hotter as you proceed. <>You reach the sliver of light. It’s the crack of a heavy stone door. You hear a voice coming from the other side. <>Okay, I use our telepathic link to speak to everyone. <><>Gundren, you’re strong enough to pull open the door, and Vel, you can give us cover fire with your magic. <><>Arannis... if we have you go in first, can you hold off your attack unless they see us? <><>Very well, I’ll stay out of sight. But if we’re spotted, will you let me attack as I please? <><>Fair enough. <> <> <>That’s a 17 for stealth. <><>Alright. Everyone, on the count of three. <><>One... <><>...two... <><>...three! <> <>I pull open the door. <>Alright, Lance you enter. You’re hit by a rush of hot air, coming from the huge cauldron of lava in the center of the room. <>There’s a short footbridge spanning across it. Standing in the center of it… <>...is Lady Malacatha. <><>OH. <>She spots you immediately. <><><>Oh shit. Okay, I draw my crossbow, and— <> <>In one outstretched arm, dangling over the lava pit, she’s holding one of the generals of the Fullcrest Alliance, General Cinturn. <>Okay, I don’t shoot. I put my crossbow away immediately. <>The rest of us enter the room to see what’s happening. <>Great. Lady Malacath greets you all. [[(Suave and sadistic)|SauveSadistic]] [[(Cold and intimidating)|ColdIntimidating]]

title: BrynnOneSecondThere
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Brynn interruptionOne>>One second there, Mr. Shadowfall. She’s not alone.

title: SauveSadistic
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX brynnEvilLaugh>>Welcome, heroes! Pardon me, I was just enjoying some quality time with the general here.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>>As you can imagine, he knows quite a bit about this rebellious “Alliance” you’ve raised against me. Unfortunately, he’s not much of a talker. Isn’t that right, general?
<<changeFont Brynn outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>The general mumbles something, as blood drips down his face.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>>I figured this lava cauldron would make him cough up more than his own fluids. It hasn’t worked so far. But, as long as you’re all here…
<<changeFont Brynn outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>She shakes the general over the lava below.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>>...how about this: You leave my castle, or the general suffers an unfortunate accident. What do you say?
[[Rebranch9]]

title: ColdIntimidating
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>>How curious… you four were supposed to be dying alongside that pathetic army outside. I’ll make you regret coming this far…
<<changeFont Brynn outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>She fixes you all with a harsh stare.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<someoneInterrupting Brynn LanceNoNoNo 1 interruptionOne>>Then she loosens her grip on the general. He starts to slip...

<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>She grabs his ankle just before he was about to slide in. A twisted grin peels its way across her face.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX brynnEvilLaugh>>Leave. Or he dies.
[[Rebranch9]]

title: Rebranch9
body:
<<changeFont Brynn outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Wait a minute. She isn’t wearing her armor, is she?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>You give her a once over and yeah, it doesn’t look like she was preparing for a fight.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Okay, so I say to Ruby over our telepathic link... 
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<changeFont Allison inCharacter>>Vel, isn’t her armor the source of most of her power?
<<changeFont Brynn outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Oh, crap, I know I found this out a couple sessions ago... Brynn, can I make a history check to remember this?
[[I'll just give this one to you.|GiveItToYou]]
[[Yep, those are the rules.|ThoseAreTheRules]]

title: LanceNoNoNo
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Lance interruptionOne>><<changeFont Lance inCharacter>>No, no, no! Wait!

title: GiveItToYou
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>It’s okay. Let’s just say you remember it.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby happy>>Oh, neat! Thanks!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<overridePose Brynn happy>>Sure.
[[MajorChoice3]]

title: ThoseAreTheRules
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>You can.
<<rollD20 Ruby>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby uncomfortable>>Uh... 10?
<<overridePose Ruby neutral>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Well, it was a pretty significant discovery for you, so even a 10 should be enough.
[[MajorChoice3]]

title: MajorChoice3
body: <><>After uncovering that tome of magical secrets from one of Lady Malacatha’s agents several sessions ago... <>... you learned that Lady Malacatha’s armor is made from an ancient Dwarven alloy that’s been enchanted by her own dark magic. <>It offers incredible protection to the wearer, and also enhances Lady Malacatha’s magical powers tenfold. <>Oh, wait! She can also put it on and take it off it just by casting a spell, right? <>Exactly. She doesn’t wear it when she’s out of combat, but she can cast a spell to summon it instantaneously. <><>Everyone, she can summon her armor at a moment’s notice. She’s vulnerable now, but won’t be for long. Now would be the best time to attack, except... <><>... The general. <><>Right. <><>Tiana, we can use your plan from last time. Distract her long enough for me to pull some stunt to rescue the general. We can do it your way. <><><><>...No. No, we can’t do that. <><>What? Why not? <><>You saw our army out there. We’re losing. We need every advantage we can get to bring Malacatha down. <><>If we make the first attack now while she’s vulnerable, we’ll have a much better chance of beating her and ending this... <><>… But if we give her a chance to use her greatest weapon from the start, she could wipe us out. <><><>... What about the general? If we hit her, she’ll just drop him. <><><>Listen, I don’t like it either, but we might not be able to survive a fight against her otherwise. <><>This means we have a better shot at saving the whole world. <> <>I draw my crossbow and ready an attack on Lady Malacatha. <><>Everyone, a combined attack on my signal. <><><>No, absolutely not! We’re heroes. We do not let hostages die. <><><>I won’t stand for this... <><>When we’re working on something this important, we have to make sure the whole team survives, not to mention everyone else counting on us. <><>And you know what? You committed to that when you helped form the Fullcrest Alliance. <><>I never would’ve “committed” if I knew you were going to want us to do something like this. <><>Wait, Allison— <><>I mean, uh, Tiana, I could use my healing magic to strengthen us. <><>Even if we save the general and give Malacatha a chance to put on her armor, we’d still be strong enough to fight her. <><>No, it wouldn’t be enough. We’d need to get a ton of health back, and you’d be losing a lot of valuable spell slots. <><>Could we at least try? <>Guys, come on, Lady Malacatha’s right there! Are we really going to do this now? <><>No, wait. There must be something everyone can agree— <>Look, whatever we do, we shouldn’t kill a hostage. If I have to save him by myself, I will. <>Oh, yeah, sure! “Oh, look at me, I’m Lance! I can go my own way and leave my teammates in the lurch, because it’s my way or the highway!” <><>Okay, okay. Let’s just all take a second— <><> Okay! Everyone! Can we please just decide what to do? <> [[(She starts dropping the hostage)|DroppingTheHostage]] [[(She starts summoning her armor)|SummoningHerArmor]]

title: AllisonItIsntAllAbout
body: <><><>It isn’t all about you!

title: FranklinTheyreNotGoing
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Franklin interruptionOne>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinUgh>>(Ruby, they’re not going to go for it, okay? Let it go.)

title: LanceLoathsomeShit
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Lance interruptionOne>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX lanceComeOn>>Well, maybe my TEAMMATES are forcing me to do some loathsome shit!

title: DroppingTheHostage
body: <> <>Everyone! If I could have your attention for a second... <>As you’re talking, you notice that Lady Malacatha has started lowering the general into the lava pit. <>I run up to her. <>Lance, Jesus fuck! <>As soon as I get there, I throw myself at the floor and grab the general’s leg so he doesn’t fall in. <>Alright then. Give me a dexterity check. <> <>Oh, fuck... 8. <>Hmm, well... [[(The general dies)|GeneralDies1]] [[(Fudge the roll)|FudgeTheRoll1]]

title: SummoningHerArmor
body: <> <>Everyone! If I could have your attention for a second... <>During your debate, you notice that with her free hand, Lady Malacatha seems to be weaving some kind of spell in the air... <>Oh, shit. <><>No, wait, hang on... <><>Vel, Gundren! She’s summoning her armor! Everyone, attack! <> <>... Do you two do so? <>Yes. I throw another handaxe. <>Um... okay. I fire an Eldritch Blast. <>And I fire my crossbow. <>This is crazy... <> <> <> <>Your attacks all hit, knocking Lady Malacatha back and leaving her with a few wounds. <>Unfortunately, she also drops the general. <>I gun it. I sprint across the bridge, drop to the ground and... and try to grab his ankle, or something. <>Okay. Give me a dexterity roll. <> <>Dammit... 8. <>Hmm, well... [[(The general dies)|GeneralDies2]] [[(Fudge the roll)|FudgeTheRoll2]]

title: GeneralDies1
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>... I’m sorry, Lance. The general falls into the pit, screaming until he hits the lava.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>... Fuck...
<<set $general_lived to false>>
[[Rebranch10]]

title: FudgeTheRoll1
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>... you manage to just barely make it. You snatch his ankle, and he’s dangling below you.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<overridePose Lance neutral>>Holy shit, that was close... 
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<changeFont Lance inCharacter>>Don’t worry, general. I’ve got you.
<<set $general_lived to true>>
[[Rebranch10]]

title: Rebranch10
body: <>I shoot Lady Malacatha! <>Unfortunately, she gets a chance to react, and... <>... she casts the spell that summons her armor. It materializes out of thin air in flourish of dark, purple energy. <>It automatically assembles itself around her, and suddenly she’s levitating off the ground, absolutely glowing with raw power. <>Motherfucker! <>But... she doesn’t attack yet. <>She lets out an evil laugh, rises into the air, then swoops forward. She flies past all of you, and out the door through which you came. <> <>I pull the general up, and set him down a safe distance away. <>Okay, you do so. He’s in shock, but alive. <>Good. <> <><><>Perhaps she’s heading back to her throne room. If we give chase, maybe we can— <>(Oh, God…) <><><>Don’t even... you know what? Stop. Enough. Please. I don’t want to keep doing this. <> [[AllisonFailState]] <> <>Don’t ”enough” me! You totally...! I mean you...! <>*Sigh* <> <> <> <><>... [[GoodEndingStart]]

title: AllisonSwearToFuckingGod
body: <><><><><><><>Lance, I swear to fucking God, what the hell is wrong with you?

title: GoodEndingStart
body:
[[Is everyone okay?|DoesEveryoneStill]]
[[(Say nothing)|SayNothing]]
[[We should stop for today.|WeShouldStop]]

title: AllisonFailState
body: <> <> <> <> <> <>“Keep doing this?” Oh, okay! My bad! <>Know what? I don’t want to keep doing this either! You going around, doing whatever the fuck you want... <>... Being a reckless moron when breaking into the castle, nearly getting us all killed fighting your “nemesis”... <><>Woah, hang on, you— <> <>Allison, wait! <> <>... <> <><>Seriously, what’s her deal? I should’ve known she’d get like that. <>...Is she coming back? Maybe we should go after her. <>Honestly, we might be better off. She’s been like that for the past... I don’t even fucking know. <>“Lance, do this,” “Lance, do that,” “Lance, if you don’t give up every second of your life for my musical, I’m going to lose it.” <>And you know what? I didn’t even like her idea for the show! I was just helping her out with it, I dunno, to be nice, or whatever. I just don’t even... <><>...Whatever, forget it. Who’s ready to finish the campaign? <>Maybe... maybe we should take a break. <>It just seems like the room could use some time to cool off. <>Wait, hang on. We’re so close to the end! <>It’s not really the same unless everyone’s here. <>Yeah, I think I’ll go home, if it’s okay with you all. Everything just feels kind of weird now. <>Wait, Frank, hang on. We can’t just... <>... <>Okay. Fine, alright. Yeah, maybe we’ll finish this later. <>Yeah, hopefully. Take care, everyone. <><> <><>Guess I’ll leave, too. See everybody later. <><> [[GeneralFailState]]

title: FudgeTheRoll2

title: Rebranch11
body: <>Lady Malacatha staggers back up. <><>Curse you... curse all of you... <> <>She starts her spell again. Suddenly, her armor materializes out of thin air in flourish of dark, purple energy. <>It automatically assembles itself around her, and suddenly she’s levitating off the ground, absolutely glowing with raw power. <>Still, she’s injured. She rises into the air, then flies past you all and through the doorway from whence you came. <><><>Alright. She’s at her full strength, but at least we managed to— <> <> <>Straight-up killing a friend wasn’t a fucking blip on the radar for you, here? <> <>The fact that we almost killed somebody wasn’t a big deal, like, at all? <> <> [[LanceFailState]] <> <>(Oh, God...) <><><>Alright, you know what? I don’t need you always second guessing me. <>I’m doing the best I fucking can, so if you don’t like my choices, maybe... ! <>... Maybe we shouldn’t even keep going. <>I... what? <>... Yeah. <><><> <><>... [[GoodEndingStart]]

title: LanceOkayStop
body: <><><><><><><><>Okay, stop. Are we really not going to talk about what just happened? Seriously?

title: LanceFailState
body: <> <> <> <> <>Know what? Screw this. I’m out. <> <> <><>Dude, seriously? <>You cut off my backstory quest, made everyone kill a friendly NPC... <>You wouldn’t even let me jump over a fucking wall! <>I’m just... whatever. See you guys later. <><> <>Lance, wait! <> <>... <>What a fucking douche! <>...Is he coming back? Maybe we should go after him. <>You saw that, right? This is what I’ve been dealing with for the past year! <>He flaked when we were supposed to be writing the show, flaked when we were doing rehearsals... <>And completely flaked when we were supposed to meet with playhouse owners to see if we could perform our show in their space. Like, my one shot at finally directing my dream play... <> <><>... Anyway, whatever. Are we going to finish this, or what? <>Maybe... maybe we should take a break. <>It just seems like the room could use some time to cool off. <>Yeah, actually, I think I’ll go home if it’s okay with you all. Feels like we should just call it. <>At least we tried. Take care, everyone. <><> <><>Yeah... alright. Guess I’ll go too. See everybody. <><> [[GeneralFailState]]

title: AllisonDoingYourOwnThing
body: <>... Doing your own thing because you just have to live out your big, heroic power fantasy... Yeah, I think I’m about done, too!

title: GeneralFailState
body:
<<overridePose Brynn neutral>>
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX doorOpenClose>><<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>...
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Thanks for having us over, Brynn. 
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Oh, uh, yeah. Of course. 
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Do you want a lift home?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>No, I’m okay. Thanks, though.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Sorry we didn’t get to finish your campaign.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>No, no, it’s okay. Really.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Maybe we can get back together another time.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Yeah...
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Anyway, thanks for trying to help. With, um... With everything.
<<showCharacter Ruby false>><<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX sitDown>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>...
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX doorOpenClose>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>...
<<sendToFailScreen Brynn>>

title: DoesEveryoneStill
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX brynnUh>>Does... everyone still want to keep going? We can take a break first, if anyone wants.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Yeah, I don’t know. Maybe we should just call it a day.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX allisonThinking>>Wait, hang on a second...
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yeah, no, I want to keep playing. We can see this through... right?
[[Rebranch12]]

title: WeShouldStop
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX brynnUh>>It sounds like everyone’s feeling a little... stressed right now. Maybe we should set the campaign aside for the day.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Yeah, maybe that’s a good idea.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX allisonThinking>>Wait, hang on a second...
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yeah, no, I want to keep playing. We can see this through... right?
[[Rebranch12]]

title: Rebranch12
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>...
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>I think we should finish.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinNotTooSure>>I dunno...
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby neutral>>No, really. I mean it.
<<overridePose Brynn neutral>>
<<overridePose Lance neutral>>
<<overridePose Allison neutral>>
<<overridePose Ruby neutral>>
<<overridePose Franklin neutral>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>We’ve come so far. And we’re so close to beating Lady Malacatha.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Let’s just finish this. It would be a shame if we’d come so far for nothing.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Yeah. We should definitely try.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Okay. I’m in.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Alright, then. What do you all do?
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>We follow Lady Malacatha.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>You chase her down the same corridor through which you came. She rounds the corner, taking the main path that you skipped before.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>As you continue to follow, you see her go through a pair of enormous doors.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>We follow.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>You find yourself in Lady Malacatha’s massive throne room. She’s before you once again. As far as you can tell, there aren’t any other entrances or exits.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Lady Malacatha turns towards you all. She does not look happy.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<changeFont Brynn inCharacter>>How long have we played this little game, adventurers?
[[(Mention their misadventures)|PreviousMisadventures]]
[[(Mention their successes)|PreviousSuccesses]]

title: SayNothing
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby uncomfortable>>Uh... so, um... 
[[Rebranch12]]

title: PreviousMisadventures
body: <> <><>You’ve told the Fullcrest Alliance that you’re heroes, here to help “save them” from me... <><>... But all along you’ve been nothing more than fools and jesters. <><>My informants have told me every blunder there is to know about you four. <><>Such as when you “fair and noble” heroes “mistakenly” burnt down a tavern. <><>And when you were all arrested for crawling through the sewers in a drunken haze… <> <> <><>All that stuff was way back at the beginning, before we even met her. How does she even know that? <><>God, those were some weird times... we did a lot of stupid stuff back then. <><>We’ve gotten into some pretty weird situations together. <><>They weren’t all that bad, though. We were just finding our groove; figuring out how we all clicked. <><>Besides, some of that stuff was kind of funny... <><>True. <><>It was then that I realized how foolish I was to have considered you my greatest enemies. <><>You’re nothing but bumblers in adventurers’ clothing. Ridiculous. <><>You certainly talk a lot for dead woman. <><>Honestly. Are these empty insults really to be your final words, Mad Queen? <><><><>My final words? Pray tell me, how do these sound... <><><>COME GET ME! [[Rebranch13]]

title: PreviousSuccesses
body: <> <><>At every step of the way, you’ve been there keeping me from what I desire. <><>I remember when we first crossed paths, all those years ago. When you stopped me from claiming that devil’s eye I’d tracked so meticulously... <><>...And when you thwarted my attempts at conquering one of your precious little cities. <> <> <><>Oh, shit! The Gregor’s Peak battle! That was so badass! <><>Yeah! Remember assassinating the undead commander? <><>Do I? That kill was, like, the highlight of my Rogue career! <><>And we did it so cleanly too. That might’ve been the first time we pulled off a plan perfectly. <>Oh man, yeah! I’m just glad none of the named NPCs got killed. We were taking a huge gamble with that flanking maneuver at the end. <>It paid off, though. <>This party’s done some pretty awesome stuff. <>Yeah, no kidding. <><>And now here you all stand, at the helm of an entire alliance just to pester me yet again. <><><><>But this will be the last time. Today, I bring an end to your incessant meddling once and for all! <><>If that’s a challenge then you will soon find it answered! <><>Agreed. Lady Malacatha, your reign ends here! <><>No, little adventurers, you are quite mistaken. Here and now, my reign will truly begin! [[Rebranch13]]

title: Rebranch13
body: <> <> <> <> <> <> <>Her armor crackles with dark energy as her entire form glows with deep purple light. <>It grows more and more radiant with each passing second, covering the entire throne room in its intense glow. <>You’re all completely blinded by it, until it suddenly subsides and you see that Lady Malacatha has taken the form... <>... of an adult red dragon! <>Well, okay then! <>You notice that the armor she was wearing seems to have transformed into a large amulet around her scaly neck. <>She scrapes her claws against the stone floor and stretches her massive wings. <><><>Oh, yes, this will do. <> <><>Roll initiative, everybody! <> <> <> <> <> <>Okay, Allison. You’re up first. <><>Alright everyone, we need to... uh... <> <> <>Actually, never mind. I’ll just cast Mass Cure Wounds on everyone. <>Wait, no, I want to hear your plan. <>Yeah, we’ve... kind of been down this road already, Lance. <>Well, alright. You heal everyone, Allison. Lance, you’re next in the turn order. <>I, uh, I guess I attack with my crossbow, or something. <>“Or something?” <>Yeah. Nothing too fancy, just to... avoid throwing anyone off, I guess. <> <>Okay, for my crossbow that’s a... 14. <>Sorry, Lance. I’m afraid that’s a miss. <> <>Okay, it’s Dragon Malacatha’s turn. [[(Attack everyone to pressure the team)|AttackEveryone]] [[(Attack a key person to pressure the team)|AttackOnePerson]]

title: AttackEveryone
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Everyone give me a Wisdom saving throw as she tilts her head back and lets out a piercing roar.
<<rollD20 Brynn>>
<<rollD20 Allison>>
<<rollD20 Franklin>>
<<rollD20 Lance>>
<<rollD20 Ruby>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Looks like Franklin and Lance are both frightened. 
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Both your attacks will be at disadvantage and you can’t move closer to Malacatha unless you snap out of it on your next turn.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinThinking>>Right out of the gate...
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>That’s... not good.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Then, she’s going to fly over to you, Allison, and bite you...
<<rollD20 Brynn>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>... Dealing 36 damage...
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Yikes.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>... And slash a claw at you, Lance...
<<rollD20 Brynn>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>... Dealing 29 points of damage...
<<rollD20 Brynn>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>...And she’s going after Ruby with another claw slash that does a whole 32 points of damage.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX rubyUh>>That was all in one turn?!
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<changeFont Allison inCharacter>>We need to coordinate. We won’t be able to survive many more attacks like that.
[[Rebranch14]]

title: AttackOnePerson
body:
<<set $franklin_is_restrained to true>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Okay, Franklin. Dragon Malacatha turns her insidious yellow eyes towards you.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>She lifts one of her claws and a burst of purple magical energy erupts out of it, striking you. Give me a Wisdom save.
<<rollD20 Franklin>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>So that’s a 10.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Sorry, no good. She’s cast Hold Person on you. You won’t be able to move or attack for the next six turns unless you succeed on a Wisdom saving throw.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Oh, shit. Okay, uh, Gundren’s not very wise, so...
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<changeFont Allison inCharacter>>Everyone, we need some kind of a plan. There’s no way we can beat Malacatha without our strongest fighter unless we coordinate.
[[Rebranch14]]

title: Rebranch14
body: <><>My thoughts exactly. But what do we do? <><><><>I’m... not sure. Anyone ha—? <> <>It’s my turn, right? Can I roll Arcana on the amulet around Dragon Malacatha’s neck? <>It is, and you can. <> <>Okay. 17? <>With a 17, you’re able to notice there’s some faint magical energy emanating from the amulet and flowing into Dragon Malacatha. <>From seeing that, would I know anything about whether or not that amulet is what’s keeping her in her dragon form? <>For that, roll a straight Intelligence check. <> <>Beautiful! Natural 20! <>Wow! Well, with a natural 20 you’re extremely confident that she can’t stay in her new form without that amulet helping her maintain it. <><><>Yes, okay! <><>Her armor, the source of her transformation, is still on her person even though she’s in dragon form. If we remove it... <><><><>Yes, that could work! <><><>But, I mean, we’ll need to stick to a plan to make this happen. <><>... And clearly, not everyone likes my plans, so... <><>Look, your plans are fine when they don’t have us killing friendly generals... <><>*Sigh.* Can we please not do this now? <> [[(Interrupt with a sudden attack)|SuddenAttack]] [[(Interrupt with a taunt)|Taunt]]

title: RubyWaitMaybe
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Ruby interruptionOne>><<changeFont Ruby inCharacter>>Wait, maybe!

title: SuddenAttack
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Okay, folks, Lady Malacatha is going to use a Legendary Action to attack again.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Oh, shit!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>She’s going to make a tail attack against Ruby for...
<<rollD20 Brynn>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>... Only 12 damage this time. That’s pretty lucky, all things considered.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Yeah, I don’t feel very lucky! Can’t we do something?
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Okay, okay. Yeah, let’s take her down.
[[Rebranch15]]

title: Taunt
body: <><><>Hah! Look at you squabbling. <> <><>How is it that you lot have been such a thorn in my side all these years? <><>It’s time for your story to end. <> <><>You’re certainly living up to your reputation as bumblers. <><>Time to put you out of your misery. <> <> <><> <><>Okay, you know what? She is so going down. <>Yeah, absolutely. <><> [[Rebranch15]]

title: Rebranch15
body: <>I’ve got an idea. <>Lance? We’re going to put on a show. <>I mean... <> <><>Arannis? Vel and I are going to make the biggest distraction we can to divert Lady Malacatha’s attention, so you can snag her amulet. <><>We’ll try to break Franklin out as well to help us. <> <><>Arannis? Vel, Gundren and I are going to make the biggest distraction we can to divert Lady Malacatha’s attention, so you can snag her amulet. <> <><>What would you have me do? <><>Honestly? Whatever works. Just make sure to get that amulet. <><><>I can do that. <> <> <>Okay, your turn, Gundren. Roll to break out of Malacatha’s hold. <> <><>Nope, 7. I think it’s all you, guys. <>Okay. Tiana? <> <>Okay, your turn, Gundren. <>I go into a rage, take out my war hammer, and charge straight at her. <> <><>Raaaah! <> <>Alright, that’s a hit! And your shouting does seem to draw Malacatha’s attention, if only slightly. <> <>I cast Enthrall on Dragon Malacatha, distracting her with a series of strange words. <> <>I’m afraid it doesn’t work. <>Crap, okay. In that case I use my bonus action to give Bardic Inspiration to Arannis. <><><>Much appreciated, Tiana. <><>Make sure it counts. <> <>Arannis, what do you do? <>Nothing yet. I’m going to hold my action until Vel makes a move. <>In that case, what do you do, Vel? <>Alright, I cast Flame Strike on Dragon Malacatha! <><><>Nice! <><><>The Vel special! <>Alright, then! Burning through the ceiling of Malacatha’s castle comes a massive column of divine flame. <> <>It strikes her squarely on the back. <>Unfortunately, she’s a red dragon and immune to fire, so I’m afraid she doesn’t take any fire damage. <>I know, I know! But she did notice that the giant column of flame came from me, right? <>She did. She turns her attention to the person who hit her with such a dramatic attack, creating a suitable opportunity... <>... For me to run up and snatch the amulet! <>Okay then, give me a Dexterity check to see if you’re able to take advantage of the moment. <> <>That’ll be a 24. <>That’ll let you reach her... <>...But the amulet is pretty big. It’s about half your size. <>Damn. Okay, I leap up onto her and try to unclasp it from Dragon Malacatha’s neck. <>Alright, but Dragon Malacatha’s onto you now, and while you’re grappling up her scales she says... <><>NO! NO! HOW DARE YOU! <> <>She shakes back and forth, sending tremors throughout the room. <><>Arannis, hang on! <> <><>Alright, Mr. Shadowfall, give me a Strength roll to see if you can maintain your grip on the amulet. <> <>Come on... Come on... <><>Oh shit. Uh, 11...? <><><>I’m sorry, Arannis, but she— <><>Lance, use—! <> <>That’s an 8! That brings my roll up to 19! <><>You barely succeed! <> <> <> <> <> <><>Yes! <>Arannis, you reach up and manage to unclasp the amulet from Dragon Malacatha’s neck, and both you and it fall to the ground. <>In that moment, Malacatha reverts back to human form. She staggers to her feet and looks wildly around the room. <> <>Franklin, you feel the effects of Hold Person suddenly wear off. <>In that case... <>... I swing at her with my war hammer! <> <>I swing at her with my war hammer! <> <> <>Without her armor protecting or empowering her, the hammer crushes her head, killing her instantly. <>Through the windows in Lady Malacatha’s throne room, you can see all of her undead soldiers collapse on the battlefield outside collapse and disintegrate. <>There’s silence for a moment. Then, you hear the distant hurrahs of soldiers of the Fullcrest Alliance cheering. They know that you’ve succeeded. <>You’ve beaten Lady Malacatha. Once, and for all. [[FallingAction]]

title: AllisonWait
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Allison interruptionOne>><<overridePose Allison happy>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX allisonYes>>Wait!

title: LanceBardicInspiration
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Lance interruptionOne>><<overridePose Lance happy>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX lanceYeahNice>>Oh, shit, your Bardic Inspiration!

title: FallingAction
body: <> <> <> <> <> <><>... <><>... <>...Wow. I guess we did it. <>Yeah. No joke. <> <><>Okay, I just want to say, I’d been planning that ending for actual years. <><>Yeah, I’ll bet. [[I'm glad we did this.|GladWeDidThis]] [[So, things got a bit tense...|ABitTense]]

title: AllisonVictoriousSilence
body: <<activateSimultaneousSpeechBubble Allison speakerTwo>>...

title: RubyVictoriousSilence
body: <<activateSimultaneousSpeechBubble Ruby speakerTwo>>...

title: ABitTense
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<overridePose Brynn neutral>> But I realize things got a little awkward while we were playing.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Yeah...
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Right. For sure.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>So, Allison, um... sorry about getting in the way of all the stuff you wanted to do.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>No, it’s... I mean, I’m sorry I gave you a hard time about everything.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>No, yeah, it's fine. I, uh, I get it.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<overridePose Brynn happy>>Well, you all managed to work together in the end, so I'd call this a successful session, overall.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<overridePose Allison happy>>Yeah. Yeah, I'd say it was.
[[Rebranch16]]

title: GladWeDidThis
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>I’m glad we got a chance to do this, you guys. When I was away in London, I was wondering if we were ever actually going to come back together.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>I was worried being separated would make us lose our momentum, but, well, here we are!
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby happy>>Yeah, of course!
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Yeah! I mean... I admit, I’d thought about not coming...
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<overridePose Allison happy>>... But I’m glad I did.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yeah. Same.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Thanks for doing this with me, everyone. It means a lot.
<<overridePose Lance happy>>
<<overridePose Ruby happy>>
<<overridePose Franklin happy>>
<<overridePose Allison happy>>
<<overridePose Brynn happy>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Yeah, of course.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Anytime.
[[Rebranch16]]

title: Rebranch16
body:
<<overridePose Lance neutral>>
<<overridePose Ruby neutral>>
<<overridePose Franklin neutral>>
<<overridePose Allison neutral>>
<<overridePose Brynn neutral>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>So, uh... So now what?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Well, Ruby and I were talking earlier. 
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Would you all be interested in starting a new campaign? I've got plenty of ideas for where it could go.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Yeah, I'd be down.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>I'm in, of course!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>So... you two?
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<cueSimultaneousDialogue Allison LanceAwkwardSilenceTwo null null>>...

<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX lanceThinking>>So, uh, Allison, do you think we could talk outside for a sec?
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Yeah, sure.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>We'll be right back.
<<showCharacter Allison false>>
<<showCharacter Lance false>>
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX sitDown>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Guess they’re gonna talk it out, finally. What happens if they say no? It wouldn't be much of a campaign with only two players.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>I mean, unless one of them stays and the other leaves, I guess.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>That would be kind of awkward.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Yeah, I don't know. But, listen... Brynn, whatever happens, thanks for helping keeping things under control today.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>I don't know, I'm not sure I'd call today, "under control", exactly.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>It could've been a lot worse. Trust me.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Yeah. You're a good friend, Brynn.
<<overridePose Franklin happy>>
<<overridePose Ruby happy>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>... And a pretty good Dungeon Master.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<overridePose Brynn happy>>Thanks, Ruby.
<<overridePose Lance neutral>>
<<overridePose Ruby neutral>>
<<overridePose Franklin neutral>>
<<overridePose Allison neutral>>
<<overridePose Brynn neutral>>
<<showCharacter Allison true>>
<<showCharacter Lance true>>
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX sitDown>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Okay, so, we talked it over and—
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<overridePose Lance happy>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX lanceYeahNice>>We're in, baby!
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Yeah, I mean, we're still working out some stuff, but...
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<overridePose Allison happy>>... But this is really fun, so, yeah. We're in. When do we start?
<<overridePose Lance happy>>
<<overridePose Ruby happy>>
<<overridePose Franklin happy>>
<<overridePose Allison happy>>
<<overridePose Brynn happy>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX rubyYes>>Yes!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Alright! Well, it'll be a little while before I get all the details of the campaign sorted out, but we can roll for characters in the meantime.
<<fadeSound CuedMusicStings>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Ooh, definitely! So, I've been getting a ton of ideas for Vel's twin sister that I wanted to run by you guys…
<<sendToWinScreen Brynn>>
